roleset.name: link 2 or more things together
roleset.note: INTERLINK-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from interlink.01-v)

example.name: passive, agr1 and arg2
example.text: According to general understanding , [Tianjin and Russia]-248 are interlinked[*-248]with convenient express air , sea , and land ports , and have historically had substantive bartertrade and economic trade co-operation .
example.arg: with convenient express air , sea , and land ports
